name: graphrag-benchmark
description: GraphRAG benchmark dataset for A/B comparisons

test_cases.question: Is BetaPlan a company or a product?
What does BetaPlan include?
test_cases.answer: BetaPlan includes coverage details for policy holders.

test_cases.question: Describe the relationship between AlphaCorp and BetaPlan.
What plan does AlphaCorp sell?
test_cases.answer: AlphaCorp sells the BetaPlan insurance product.

test_cases.question: Which product includes coverage details for policy holders?
test_cases.answer: BetaPlan includes coverage details for policy holders.

test_cases.question: Name the provider of the product that includes coverage details.
What does AlphaCorp offer policy holders?
test_cases.answer: AlphaCorp offers the BetaPlan product with coverage details.
